welcome_title: Uncover the secrets of your natal chart
welcome_subtitle: Personal AI astrologer analyzes the unique features of your personality, talents, and life path based on the precise time of your birth
hero_badge: We use Swiss Ephemeris - the most accurate calculations
features_title: Unlock the secrets of your natal chart
feature_1_desc: Get personalized interpretations based on your unique data, not generic phrases from magazines.
feature_2_desc: Keep a record of events and track how the movement of planets affects your life in real-time.
feature_3_desc: An interactive graphical chart will show you all the aspects of your personality in a beautiful and clear way.
step_1_desc: Provide the exact date, time, and place of birth for maximum calculation accuracy.
step_1_detail_1: Exact date and time of birth
step_2_desc: Our algorithms will instantly build your unique natal chart based on Swiss Ephemeris.
step_3_desc: Our AI oracle will analyze your chart and provide deep, personalized interpretations.
preview_subtitle: Simple and clear process of creating a chart
testimonial_1_text: I never thought astrology could be so accurate! The AI analysis revealed aspects of my personality that I had no idea about.
testimonial_2_text: I have been using it for half a year. Daily forecasts really help me plan important decisions. The accuracy is amazing!
testimonial_3_text: The best astrological program I have ever used. The chart visualization is simply incredible!
trust_secure_desc: Your personal data is under reliable protection
trust_certified_desc: We use Swiss Ephemeris - a world standard
demo_subtitle: Interactive example of a natal chart with full AI analysis
demo_sun_content: You are a creative, intuitive person with a deep emotional world. Your empathy and ability to understand others make you a natural healer.
demo_moon_content: Your emotional nature needs recognition and applause. You generously share your feelings with others.
demo_rising_content: You appear as an optimistic, adventure-loving person. Others perceive you as a wise teacher and traveler.
demo_week_forecast: A favorable time for creative projects. Venus in a trine to your Sun brings harmony to relationships.
demo_month_forecast: Mars in your 10th house activates career opportunities. It's time for important professional decisions.
demo_cta_text: Want to get your own detailed chart with personal forecasts?
pricing_subtitle: From a free introduction to professional astrological consulting
plan_premium_desc: Full access to all AI astrologer features
pricing_faq_1_a: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. When you upgrade to a larger plan, you pay the difference.
pricing_faq_2_a: Yes, all paid plans have a 7-day free trial.
pricing_faq_3_a: With a yearly payment, you save 20% and get 2 months for free.
pricing_faq_4_a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without additional fees.
secure_payment_desc: Protected by SSL and PCI DSS certificates
final_cta_title: Your unique natal chart is waiting for you
final_cta_subtitle: Join thousands of people who have already unlocked the secrets of their personality with our AI astrologer
faq_items.0.q: How accurate are your astrological calculations?
faq_items.0.a: We use Swiss Ephemeris - the most accurate astronomical data recognized by professional astrologers worldwide. Accuracy is our top priority.
faq_items.1.q: Why are AI interpretations better than regular ones?
faq_items.1.a: Unlike generic horoscopes, our AI creates a unique interpretation based on all the data in your chart: planetary positions, houses, and aspects between them. This is a deeply personalized analysis.
faq_items.2.a: Yes. We take privacy seriously. Your data is used exclusively for calculations within the app and is never shared with third parties.
meta_description: Calculate your natal chart online and get a deep analysis of your personality, talents, and destiny with the help of artificial intelligence. Find out what the stars say!
offer_free_desc: Basic natal chart and daily horoscope
offer_premium_desc: Full astrological analysis and personal forecasts
review_1_body: Incredibly accurate analysis! The natal chart helped me understand my strengths.
social_proof_text: Join thousands of subscribers who are already using our horoscopes
no_spam_guarantee: No spam guaranteed - we respect your privacy
special_offer_text: Subscribe now and get an exclusive weekly guide!
subscription_success_message: Thank you for subscribing. Check your email for your first horoscope.
subscription_error: An error occurred while subscribing. Please try again.
